Summary: OBSERVED ORBS OVER CHARLOTTE MOTOR SPEEDWAY AT APPROXIMATELY 9-10 PM ON MAY 26TH
divs: sighting detailsthere were about 8-10 orange\yellow orbs moving northwest. they were not in any formation, but clearly moving together. afte they past, one large orange\yello orbd came out of the south east and becan to move in a north northwest direction. while moving in the group, they began to fade away as though they were moving out from the atmosphere, rather than within the atmosphere.
